properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:39PM CST until January 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County

.Runoff from heavy rainfall over the last 36 hours over the Green
River basin will cause minor flooding to develop on the Green River
at Paradise. The river is forecast to rise above flood stage Sunday
and crest near 382.7 feet Tuesday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise.
* from Sunday afternoon to late Wednesday night.
* At  8:15 PM Saturday the stage was 376.1 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 382.6 feet by early Tuesday morning. The
river will fall below flood stage by Wednesday before midnight.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
